attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that members of the UK house of lords and members of the UK parliament are subject to the laws of the land and liable for the same punishments in the same way as the people who pay for their existence - the taxpayer - is subject to the laws of the land and liable for punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What more is there to say in the matter?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. We are not aware of any way in which members of the Commons and Lords are not subject to "the laws of the land".
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
